## clamp variable

Clamps all color channels to \[0,1\] interval and calls `ensureAlpha` to ensure alpha channel is defined (if missing sets it to `alpha`<!-- -->, default: 1).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clamp: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, src: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, alpha?: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
